item.title: Now United - All Day - Key of Bm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm (Transposed down a half step from the original).
Chords Used: G, A, F#m, Bm
As performed by Now United.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tZEklY1fgdQ
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Motion background from motionbolt.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: OneRepublic - Rescue Me - Key of Bm
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm. In the original key.
Chords Used: Bm, A, D, G
As performed by OneRepublic. This was a request from my own two boys, age 7 & 10. If you read this comments, they would be thrilled if you watched some of their videos and followed them.
Older son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnXyBzSlqfs_N0Sz8EeTj7Q Younger son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLCD1tFgLd6rgT1WzdR4paA
And if you are reading all of this, please follow my other ukulele channel: https://www.youtube.com/ukestuff As these videos cannot be monetized, subscriptions and views on the other channel really will help me out.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JZA5jnT4brY
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion video is from churchmediadrop.com
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Cult Of Luna - Passing Through - Key of Bm
item.description:
Hey! Check my awesome stuff for merch at https://www.redbubble.com/people/Ukeledu/shop
-
¡Hey! Échale un ojo a mis molones artículos de merchan en https://www.redbubble.com/es/people/Ukeledu/shop
________________________
STRUMMING PATTERN / RASGUEO:
All chords / Todos los acordes: D D DD
D: Down / Hacia abajo U: Up / Hacia arriba x: Muted strigs (Down) / Cuerdas muteadas con la palma de la mano (hacia abajo)
________________________
Hey! If you liked this video, give me a like, subscribe and comment your doubts, suggestions or anything you want.

item.title: Charlie Puth - Done for Me - Key of Bm
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Done For Me by Charlie Puth featuring Kehlani on the ukulele. The chords used are Bm7 Abdim7 Gmaj7 C#m7 F#7.
*The Abdim7 should be G#dim7 but I couldn't find the diagram in the chord font I use. Had to use the enharmonic.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Moby - One of These Mornings - Key of Bm
item.description:
By Moby.
This is a good song to practise the slightly complicated Bm chord.
